mapper.insert: insert into mybatis_member ( member_no, member_name, member_age, member_phone, member_address ) values ( member_seq.nextval, #{member_name}, #{member_age}, #{member_phone}, #{member_address} )
mapper.select: select * from mybatis_member order by member_no
mapper.update: update mybatis_member set member_name = #{member_name}, member_age = #{member_age}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_address = #{member_address} where member_no = #{member_no}
